summary: Interactive draft app where clicking "Yes" triggers follow-up content; user-requested personalization of displayed name and post-"Yes" image.
known_issues: Requested image to display after "Yes" is clicked is referenced but not provided in the conversation context.

existing_features.title: Update the proposal question text in the initial stage to display the name exactly as: "Suzanne The Nazareth" (replacing "Miss Nazareth").
After the user clicks YES, show the provided uploaded image (aman_suz_pic.jpeg) as the final photo in the YES flow without requiring the user to upload a photo.
Add the uploaded image file aman_suz_pic.jpeg to the frontend static assets and reference it from the final stage UI.

new_feature_requests.summary: After the user clicks "Yes", display the provided picture.
Change displayed name text to "Suzanne The Nazareth" instead of "Miss Nazareth".

projectName: Show provided photo after YES click and update displayed name
